title: The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Seinen
tags: An*l   Aristocracy   Assassins   Beastkin   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   C*nnilingus   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Dwarfs   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fantasy World   Fast Learner   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Game Elements   Heroes   Hiding True Identity   H*ndjob   Knights   Level System   Love at First Sight   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Pharmacist   Prostit**es   R-18   Reincarnated in Another World   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Threesome   Wars   Weak to Strong

description:
Seiichi Takeda who yearned for a free life was given a chance to reincarnate into a different world. Since he has little trust in others (no, he is not an edgy MC. He is normal), he chose the lowly job (seen in high society aka Aristocracy) of a porter, the only job that has a storage skill (there are magical bags tho). 

This is the story of a man conquering a different world with his low amount of mana utilizing things like skills, equipment, and drugs.>
